data.name: John Wade Roofing
data.address: 3214 W Park Row Dr, Pantego, TX 76013

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"Good quality, fair pricing, prompt service, excellent communications." "He knows how to work with his customers and give them his attention." "Amazing customer service, communication and on time delivery."

This is the second roof I have had installed by John Wade Roofing. I am very happy with the installation.  John is very easy to work with and his various Crew Members are great.  The Crew that installed this roof worked very hard.  The … More

John Wade replaced our home’s roof. Work was done in a day, and the roof looks great! I’ve known John Wade for years through his work for my clients. It was finally time to have him do my home too. Solid work, great communication, and a reputation that is duly earned! It’s why this real estate broker continues to recommend him! More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you for the glowing review, we appreciate your business Marium!

I can’t praise John Wade Roofing enough for their exceptional integrity and craftsmanship. Due to an East-West street address mix-up, their crew mistakenly began removing my rental property’s roof. John, the owner, called me immediately to … More
